sections.title: Vigilante (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Vigilante class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Vigilante)
sections.description: Vigilantes are proficient with all simple and martial weapons, light armor, medium armor, and shields (except tower shields).

sections.title: Dual Identity (Ex) (Vigilante)
sections.description: A vigilante maintains two distinct identities (social and vigilante) with separate alignments, changing between them takes 1 minute out of sight, and provides protection from scrying and knowledge checks.

sections.title: Seamless Guise (Ex) (Vigilante)
sections.description: The vigilante gains a +20 circumstance bonus on Disguise checks to appear as his current identity when suspected of being someone else.

sections.title: Social Talent (Vigilante)
sections.description: Vigilantes gain social talents at 1st level and every 2 levels thereafter, providing various abilities usable primarily in social identity.

sections.title: Vigilante Specialization (Ex) (Vigilante)
sections.description: At 1st level, vigilantes choose to be either an avenger (gains full BAB) or a stalker (gains hidden strike precision damage).

sections.title: Vigilante Talent (Vigilante)
sections.description: Vigilantes gain vigilante talents at 2nd level and every 2 levels thereafter, providing combat and utility abilities primarily for vigilante identity.

sections.title: Unshakable (Ex) (Vigilante)
sections.description: Starting at 3rd level, a vigilante adds his class level to the DC of any Intimidate attempts made against him.

sections.title: Startling Appearance (Ex) (Vigilante)
sections.description: At 5th level, when attacking unaware foes, the vigilante treats them as flat-footed for the turn and imposes a -4 penalty on their attacks until the vigilante's next turn.

sections.title: Frightening Appearance (Ex) (Vigilante)
sections.description: At 11th level, when attacking unaware foes, the vigilante can make a free Intimidate check to demoralize nearby enemies, potentially frightening the target.

sections.title: Stunning Appearance (Ex) (Vigilante)
sections.description: At 17th level, successful attacks against unaware foes can stun the target unless they succeed on a Will save.

sections.title: Vengeance Strike (Ex) (Vigilante)
sections.description: At 20th level, vigilantes can study a target for up to 5 rounds to gain stacking bonuses on a devastating vengeance strike attack.

sections.title: Past Your Limits (Ex) (Vigilante)
sections.description: At 20th level, the vigilante gains one additional social talent and one additional vigilante talent, with the vigilante talent ignoring specialization restrictions.
